item.title: Send message
item.description: This endpoint is solely responsible for sending emails over Ninjaemail’s API. Request Endpoint POST <endpoint>/api/v1/send/message Authentication Headers Fields Value X-Server-API-Key <secret_token> Request Body Parameters Type Details to Array The e-mail addresses of the recipients (max 50) cc Array The e-mail addresses of the CC contacts (max 50) bcc Array The e-mail addresses of the BCC contacts (max 50) from String The e-mail address for the From header subject String The subject of the email tag String The tag of the email html_body String The HTML body of the e-mail attachments Array You need to provide Array of Objects with more details.
